projects.title: ikiora.com
projects.description:
Plataforma de entrega ultra rápida para compras en tiendas locales y restaurantes.

ikiOra nace como un portal de venta online agregador de tiendas fisicas de la ciudad. La misión de ikiora era ofrecer al comercio tradicional la oportunidad de aprovechar internet como canal de venta complementario, y ofrecer a los usuarios la posibilidad de acceder a un amplio catalogo de productos en un único One Stop Shopping con la comodidad de comprar desde casa y recibiri los productos inmediatamente.
En 2013 trasladamos el modelo de negocio a Madrid construyendo un market place con las tiendas de Madrid
Agosto 2014: ikiOra se convierte en la plataforma de entrega ultra rápida para compras en tiendas locales y restaurante. 
Los usuarios que no encuentran lo que buscan en ikiOra puden pedir lo que quieran de cualquier tienda y restaurante.
Septiembre 2014: 
Proceso de creación e inversión; puesta en marcha Test en Zaragoza donde conseguimos primeros clientes y primeras ventas; conseguida primera ronda de inversión de Business Angels y financiación ENISA; trasladmos el modelo de negocio a Madrid, conviertiendo ikiOra en una plataforma de on demand delivery, para compras en tiendas y restaurantes de la ciudad, con un servicio de entrega ultra rápida.

profile_positions.description:
Main Responsibilities:
Product Marketing Manager 50%
Ensure that all product features are delivered on time and to quality standards.
Communicate regular updates, and act as central point of contact for feature for all departments.
Collaborating with engineers, specifying and detailing the product vision.
Data Analyzing through mobile analytics tools for like Google Analytics Firebase, iTunes Analytics, Facebook Analytics as well as internal insights related to business needs.
Driving researches and focus group in order to test product usability and user experience.
Benchmarking with similar products present to the market and monitoring new technologies and digital changes. 
Acting as "The voice of Customer" to inform developers and other team involved in the process, about customers needs and product optimization.

Marketing and Communication Manager 50%
Developing and execution of Marketing and Communication Campaign to introduce the new digital product "Buaala App" to the market as well as the new brand.
• Driving the execution of marketing and communication activities.
• Manage planning, forecasting and monitoring against marketing budget.
• Planning Marketing Campaign and drive the execution on different Digital Advertisement Platforms (Facebook ADS, Twitter ADS, SEM, SEA Perfomance, Mailing, RTB,) for customers' acquisition.
•  Coordinating marketing team and third parties
• Leading and coordinating media and publicity agencies.
• KPI definition and monitoring  the results.
profile_positions.title: Product Marketing Manager Buaala

profile_positions.description:
Marketing & Communication Manager Buaala Mobile App.
Buaala is the mobile app that inspires you audiovisual content like movies and series, employing an Artificial Intelligence Algorithm based on Collective Intelligence. I joined Knowdle Media Group to investigate the application of bio-inspired algorithms in estimating the future demands of KMG products and services.  My role in Buaala Project is bringing my experience in the development of technology-based products and launch them  to the market.  I also bring vision and and strategy of marketing and communication campaigns in order to help Knowdle Media Group Company to introduce and consolidate Buaala Product and Brand to the market, acquire costumers, growth and generate revenues.

Main Responsibilities:
Developing and execution of Marketing and Communication Strategy to introduce the new digital product "Buaala App" to the market as well as the new brand.
• Driving the execution of marketing and communication activities.
• Manage planning, forecasting and monitoring against marketing budget.
• Plan Marketing Campaign Strategy and drive the execution on Digital Advertisement Platforms (Facebook, Twitter, SEM, Perfomance, Mailing) for customers' acquisition.
• KPI definition and measure the results of the marketing activities to achieves company objectives
• Coordinate marketing team and driving the execution of tactical actions.
• Supervisor and coordination with apps developers in order to build a product that customers will activelyuse, love and generate revenues.
• Coordinate the agencies and third parties that collaborate with marketing department.
profile_positions.title: Marketing and Communication Manager

profile_positions.description:
Saludabit is a health and wellness digital platform.
Working for the project Saludabit as Brand and Digital Product Manager.  I take care of carrying out the strategy and tactics of marketing actions (ATL and BTL) defined for product launch and achieve objectives of customer acquisition and revenues.
Coordination and control of online and off-line campaigns: SEM, Remarketing, RTB, Facebook, Twitter, Media, TV, TLM
Search and optimization of customer acquisition channels that best fit the target audience.
Identify growth channels drivers.
Coordination of agencies and developers teams in remote, definition of KPI and control. Marketing Plan: strategy and actions´ execution to achieve business unit and marketing objectives

Main Responsibilities at Saludabit:
- Launch and consolidate Saludabit Brand to the Spanish market
- Launch health Saludabit Product to the market
-  Marketing Budget Control
-  Establish KPI (Revenues-CAC –Conversions- Visits-) and controlling using tools like Google Analytics, Webmaster tools, Woorank and other tools  to optimize Saludabit site
-  Implement, control and  optimization of online marketing campaign (SEO, SEA, Adwords, Social Media Ads, Display, Mailing)
-  Identify the best channels and actions for customer’s acquisition
-  Identify trends in digital marketing being alert on any changes that could impact to the Saludabit platform
- Identify market trends in our sector, new competitors and monitoring them
- Agencies coordination and supervise strategy and actions implemented
-  Landing pages and site/blog optimization in order to improve performance and customer acquisition funnel
-  Collaborate and coordinate developers and designers in order to optimize Saludabit site and facilitate UX (user experience)
-  Collaborate with other internal department in order to offer a better product solution and benefits  to the customers
- Implement a Customer Care attention and Direct Marketing Actions with mail marketing and call centre
profile_positions.title: Marketing Specialist at Saludabit.es – OCU

profile_positions.description:
In 2011 I started as co-founder of my own Startup ikiOra pioner in On Demand Delivery in Spain. Our users get any product in the city to receive it in less than 1 hour.

In ikiOra I worked as Marketing and Communication Manager - CMO . as well as in the construction of the marketplace working closely with developers in order to optimize the site and apps to make a ever more beautiful user experience that make users repeat in their shopping at ikiOra.
Even if we achieved good metrics we weren't be able to close a second investment round. 
Reaching Important Goals like: 
Launching a new product-service to the market;
Get customers willing to pay for the product service offered;
Making people paid for the delivery (5€ for each delivery even when the cost of the Goods was less then the delivery fee);
Reach first position in organic search in Google and other search engines - SEO – with converting keywords;

Main Responsabilities:
➢  Coordinate new platform and apps development with CTO
➢ Ecommerce Manger
➢ Marketing Plan: definition, strategy and execution of online and offline actions for customers acquisitions
➢ Marketing budget control
➢ Construction ikiOra.es marketplace with prestashop
➢ Catalogue and products managment, following a Search Engine Optimization Strategy
➢ Construction and manteinance ikiOra blog in Wordpress
➢ KPIs Definición (CAC-Cohortes-Life Time Value- recurrence -Convertions-Visits)
➢ KPI control and analytics reports
➢ SEO offpage and onpage achieving first positions in Google with converting keyswords
➢ Email marketing 
➢Planning, management and optimization of Marketing Campaigns: SEM, Facebook Ads, Twitter Ads
➢ Social Media and communication planner:  communiation and content management in social media
➢ ikiOra blog content marketing management
➢ Public Relation and press relations.
